name: Koriel Dragonchild
url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Prestige Class NPCs/Dragon Disciple/Dragon Disciples/Ice Maiden/Koriel Dragonchild

sections.body: The descendant of a white dragon and an elf, Koriel was driven to prove herself by killing a draconic relation and eating his heart, claiming his territory and hoard.
Koriel maintains a vast expanse of mountains as her domain, and those who enter it must pay tribute or surrender their lives.
Koriel sees herself as more dragon than elf, and lives as if she were a full-blooded dragon, killing those who say otherwise.
